title: Reported for offensive language (but really for picking off meta champ)
body:
So I picked nunu for jungle, which I thought was reasonable (esp considering on a normal game)

Then cop abuse from team mates, "f... troll"  "s...t"   etc
I say nothing offensive throughout and state I am going to report them, then I cop a warning after the game 
"you have been reported for offensive language .. we know everyone has bad days  etc "

WTF is this reporting system so that anyone can make a report for anything and you get a blackmark?? even if you hadn't done what they say you did??
someone please explain

replies.body: Nunu is a great jungler though.... If the report was not warranted i'm sure it will be overlooked =D
it can happen honestly specialy as jungler when lanes lose it is automaticly your fault that they fed hard

Yup, just got a 10 game chat restriction because of the same thing. Player Malzahar Top, won lane but we ended up losing the game. Same duo reported me two games in a row, leading me to a chat restriction. 

THEN

In the 10 games, I got reported for verbal abuse, when I literally DID NOT SAY A SINGLE THING LOL

An automatic system is great when it works. The system at the moment, unfortunately, still has issues (such as my experience)

Not knowing the details of the situation I can only tell you what I do know, which is that the warnings you receive when you exit post game are only warnings. If you legit haven't done anything and the report was false, then the warning means nothing because the report got thrown out, the warning basically just means you were reported by more than one player, it doesn't necessarily mean it will count towards a punishment in the future.

Of course if the report was legit then the warning means the reports have been marked against your account in the system, and that if you continue to get reported for that behaviour you will face a punishment.

It appears that the reason you are being reported is not due to in game abuse, but rather that you autolock jungle in blind pick regardless of if another player has already called the role and locked in. We're aware that call order is not ideal, which is why the new champ select is a thing and will eventually be a thing for unranked modes.
But until then, players do not appreciate when someone on their team takes the role of another player and this is reflected in your reports.

Riot Gehirn, look up my smurf 'peasentcominthru' and tell me why i have received 2 warnings for behavior, because i can tell you now, i rarely ever talk on that account and still get told im getting reported for doing literally nothing. Seriously, check the reports for the second game ever played in bots, there was a Salty AF Miss Fortune who reported me and said nothing that warranted a report. I played mid annie and wasnt trolling, it was literally someone who has no emotional control. Im sticking my neck out here even posting this and by no means am i trying to instigate a fight, i just want everyone to know that the system isnt perfect.
100% do not believe this. I guarantee you acted like a jerk

Frankly, I don't really care if you believe me or not.  It happened end of story.
 And if it happened  to me , it can happen to you.
I've been playing league for over 6 years, and never once have I received any warning or punishment. Not once in over 6 years pal

Been saying this for ages....
They dont have the balls to remove players that are abusive....
It appears you got 2 warnings for posting 2 many low quality shit posts sir
